Medford.Central Medford High School: Central Medford High School (formerly Medford Opportunity High School) is a public alternative high school in Medford, Oregon, United States. In 2010 the school moved from its original location on Earhart Street to its new location on Oakdale Avenue in Medford. It occupies part of the old South Medford High School (which is now located on Cunningham Avenue in Medford).
